Package index

Preprocess data

process_data()
Create SCEG-HiC preprocessed input data
Aggregate_datasets()
Create aggregated data for SCEG-HiC
generate_aggregated_datastes()
Create aggregated data for a certain cluster
estimateSizeFactorsForMatrix()
Function to calculate the size factor for the single-cell data
asSlamMatrix()
Convert a sparseMatrix from Matrix package to a slam matrix
isSparseMatrix()
Convert a sparseMatrix from Matrix package to a slam matrix
estimateSizeFactorsForSparseMatrix()
Estimate size factors for each column, given a sparseMatrix from the Matrix package
estimateSizeFactorsForDenseMatrix()
Estimate size factors dense matrix
estimate_t()
Find the most commonly occuring relative expression value in each cell
dmode()
use gaussian kernel to calculate the mode of transcript counts

Calculate weight

calculateHiCWeights()
Calculate promoters, enhancers, and Hi-C matrix of genes
annotateTSS()
Annotate the provided Transcription Start Sites
liftOverPeaks()
Peaks corresponding genome version conversion

Run model

Run_SCEG_HiC()
Run SCEG-HiC's model
normalizeHiCWeights()
The bulk average Hi-C matrix normalization
wglasso()
Gene network reconstruction by integration of priori biological knowledge

Visualize the gene-enhancer

connections_Plot()
Plot links of SCEG-HiC on focused genes
coverPlot()
Plot links of SCEG-HiC on focused genes and Tn5 insertion frequency over a region
LinksPlot()
Plot linked genomic elements

A small example paired scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq data.
